definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to eject/to exit from/to pop up

sentences.english: I double feet hair dint, the Huo ground plays white dress Human body side, the one punch hits to go out.
sentences.chinese: 我雙腳發力，霍地彈到白衣人身邊，一拳砸出去。

sentences.english: Supported user-defined unread notification of automatical protection.
sentences.chinese: 支持用戶自定義的新未讀消息彈出提示。

sentences.english: This functionality would also address problems with pop-up blockers.
sentences.chinese: 該功能還會解決彈出攔截器問題。

sentences.english: Administer small needle-knife and focal injection to 10 diagnosed trigger fingers.
sentences.chinese: 對10例確診爲彈響指採用小針刀加局注治療。

sentences.english: The filter-through of stimulus cash to the pachinko parlours has historical precedent.
sentences.chinese: 彈球館通過現金刺激計劃受益是有歷史先例。

sentences.english: It's a mix between football, basketball and hockey with trampolines thrown in.
sentences.chinese: 有包括橄欖球，籃球以及曲棍球，利用蹦牀彈跳發球。

sentences.english: All these details can be retrieved by activating a pop-up window.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過打開一個彈出窗口獲得所有配置信息。

sentences.english: Soft rain is knocking at the red window.
The rule of the pressure circumference distributing on the boat-tail's different sections is acquired.
sentences.chinese: 獲得了旋轉彈模型船尾不同截面圓周壓力分佈規律。

sentences.english: This rifle can chamber short or long cartridges.
sentences.chinese: 這種來復槍的槍膛可以裝短彈或長彈。

sentences.english: I got some great shots of the boy who plays the guitar on the left.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了幾張特榜的在左邊彈吉他的男孩兒照片。

sentences.english: A pop-up tip will tell you whether it is on or off.
sentences.chinese: 一個彈出提示會告訴你高亮是啓用還是關閉了。

sentences.english: And the means for rotary missile wind tunnel measuring pressure test is aggrandized.
sentences.chinese: 拓展了旋轉彈風洞測壓實驗手段。

sentences.english: We see a window as shown above popping up.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以看到如上顯示的窗口彈出。

sentences.english: The display of the pop-ups trigger audio cues when enabled.
sentences.chinese: 啓用後，顯示彈出窗口的操作將觸發聲音提示。

sentences.english: That guy can sing while playing the guitar. That is defintely a turn-on for me.
sentences.chinese: 那個男生會彈吉他唱歌，我最迷這個了。

definition: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch

to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
